AltName.entry: THE STOMPIN HOOLEY BARN DANCE BAND

Desc.entry: A barn dance band who produce a lively fusion of folk, jazz and funk music which has powerful driving rhythms guaranteed to get feet tapping and people dancing. Years of experience playing for country dancing combine with the energy and vitality of youth to produce highly danceable music and a calling style that will ensure all your audience will have a memorable time. The band are available for social events throughout the North of England.
